Messages.PendingDelete: You need to restart the application in order to uninstall the plugin.
Messages.AlreadyExists: There is already a plugin with the same name.
Messages.AddPlugin1: An error occurred while trying to add the new plugin.
Messages.AddPlugin2: The new plugin has been added correctly.
Messages.AddPlugin3: There were no errors, but the new plugin could not be added. Ckeck it please.
Messages.ValidDll: This dll is not a valid plugin.
Messages.PluginNotFound: Plugin not found. Check the name.
Messages.RemovePlugin: The new plugin has been removed correctly, but you need to restart the application in order to complete the process.
Messages.Strangething: The plugin assembly doesn't exit. Check it please.
